characterDescription:
Amark, in an encounter with Took, was shown Szeth as Took's then slave.
When Ton gripes to Took to ask of Szeth something else other than standing up, jumping up and down, pouring Ton's beer upon his own head, Took tells Szeth to cut his arm up.
At this directive, Amark tells Took the following:

characterDetails.Notes:
Amark was mentioned to Kaladin as one of the bridgemen that died during a bridge run.[citation needed]
It is unknown whether they are the same person or two different men.
